name: CocktailMaker
0:
”alexa open cocktail maker”
”tell me how to make a gin and tonic”
”cocktail containing bourbon”
skdetail:
Rated: Mature. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: cocktail maker
des:
To open the Cocktail Maker say

 open cocktail maker

To learn how to make a cocktail given its name and search the Cocktail Maker Database

 tell me how to make <cocktail>
 tell me how to make a Gin and Tonic

To search cocktails by all ingredients

 search for cocktails that include <ingredient>
 cocktail containing <ingredient>
 cocktail containing bourbon

To search cocktails by its base or main ingredient

 cocktails with main ingredient <ingredient>
 cocktails with main ingredient bourbon

To hear instructions and help:

 help

One you have selected a cocktail, to hear these ingredients and instructions again

 please repeat
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
